add.name: Content-Security-Policy
add.value: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.udtrucks.net *.telerik.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: *.udtrucks.net; frame-src 'self'; form-action 'self'

add.name: EventStore
add.connectionString: Data Source=10.180.97.82,1436;Initial Catalog=eCom_UDCFS_QA_Eventstore;Persist Security Info=True;Integrated Security=SSPI

add.name: CommonDB
add.connectionString: Data Source=10.180.97.82,1436;Initial Catalog=eCom_UDCFS_QA_Common;Persist Security Info=True;Integrated Security=SSPI

add.name: ProfilesDB
add.connectionString: Data Source=10.180.97.82,1436;Initial Catalog=eCom_UDCFS_QA_Profiles;Persist Security Info=True;Integrated Security=SSPI

add.name: MarketingDB
add.connectionString: Data Source=10.180.97.82,1436;Initial Catalog=eCom_UDCFS_QA_Marketing;Persist Security Info=True;Integrated Security=SSPI

errorLog.connectionString: Data Source=10.180.97.82,1436;Initial Catalog=eCom_UDCFS_QA_Common;Persist Security Info=True;Integrated Security=SSPI
